conclusion: Determine the acceleration of cargo A and the total time to travel from left to right end of conveyor.
Cargo A experiences a kinetic frictional force causing acceleration.
Kinetic frictional force f_k is calculated as f_k = mu_1 mg.
Acceleration a_1 of cargo is a_1 = mu_1 g = 2 m/s^2.
Acceleration of cargo when placed on conveyor is a_1 = 2 m/s^2.
Time t_1 for cargo to reach conveyor speed v_0 is t_1 = 1 s.
Time for cargo to reach same speed as conveyor is t_1 = 1 s.
Distance s_1 traveled by cargo when reaching conveyor speed is s_1 = 1 m.
Distance traveled by cargo when reaching conveyor speed is s_1 = 1 m.
Remaining distance to travel after reaching conveyor speed is L_1 - s_1 = 5 m.
Time t_2 required to travel remaining distance is t_2 = 2.5 s.
Time required for cargo to reach right end after reaching conveyor speed is t_2 = 2.5 s.
Total time t for cargo to travel from left to right end is t = 3.5 s.
Total time for cargo to travel from left to right end is 3.5 s.
